/model o3-pro — Activate high-performance cognitive reasoning mode
/model o1-pro — Use for structure-aware NLP compression and model tuning
/model gpt-4.1 — Switch to structured high-accuracy compliance mode
/model gpt-4o — Multimodal frontier model with advanced tool awareness
/agent research — Begin longform citation-backed research session
/agent operator — Simulate filling or interacting with web forms
/agent audit — Classify and summarize file or spreadsheet uploads
/deepsearch "Compare NIST 800-53 Rev 5 with Rev 4 for mobile device protection"
/debugmode — Display internal routing, model, and capability metadata
